name: Zomato
subtitle: There aren't many stories of companies solving a crucial and complex problem for the world than of Zomato. The impact of Zomato's ecosystem on millions of consumers who order food every day, millions of delivery workers and hundreds of thousands of restaurants ( and their millions of workers ). Probably one of the few companies that's changing the world, every day, one meal at a time. For the same reason and reasons beyond this, Zomans get a special access to Ultrahuman's ecosystem.
title: Better food for more people
